Articles.Content: It is on CKAN, it's just not updated yet.
So will there be an update soon for 1.0.2?

Glad I found other people are having the multiple copies on toolbar issues with this mod, as I thought I was going nuts when it kept doing it to me. Be glad to see a fix, as this is one of the most useful mods out there.

I have the same issue with multiple copies..

It seems that this happens when there is more than one docking port ?

it might be wise to wait for a stable version of ksp that have 2 updates since his release

Glad I found other people are having the multiple copies on toolbar issues with this mod, as I thought I was going nuts when it kept doing it to me. Be glad to see a fix, as this is one of the most useful mods out there.

Is there a fix? I just read that other mods have resolved this issue, but this one here hasn't. And I would really like this one to work, because I love it dearly
Yall need to read the last couple pages of thread before posting.

@NavyFish - Is there a repository somewhere that I can submit patches to for 1.0? I think the toolbar fix is pretty simple. I've got a locally compiled version that just comments out a single line that seems to have fixed the issue. Looks like the appLauncherButton can only be added once now

diff -r .\090\DockingPortAlignment.cs .\100\DockingPortAlignment.cs

218c218

< appLauncherButton = null;

---

> //appLauncherButton = null;

Edited May 4, 2015 by xep01
added patch snippet

I'll post an update tonight. Hadn't been monitoring the thread, my apologies.

I will probably get the code up and public sooner than later so folks can help me maintain this.
Excellent news! One of my favorite mods. Thank you for all your work on it, NavyFish.

Version 6.2 Released

[fixed] Stock toolbar button no longer multiplies like a rabbit! [Thanks xep10!]

Edited May 5, 2015 by NavyFish
Great work! Is it 1.0.2-compatible?
Yes! Forgot to update the thread title, just did so.

! ! ! THANK YOU ! ! !

*bows*

Great mod glad to see it updated!

I've always wondered if it would be possible to make the docking window display external cameras? So you could put one on your docking port and then the cross hairs would nicely overlaid.
Merci. <3

Version 6.2 Released

[fixed] Stock toolbar button no longer multiplies like a rabbit! [Thanks xep10!]

Well about bloomin' time! Now I can have a play at KSP.
Thank you so much for this.

Version 6.2 Released

[fixed] Stock toolbar button no longer multiplies like a rabbit! [Thanks xep10!]

Great news! Thanks, NavyFish! Have some more rep!

EDIT: Sorry, NavyFish. Board won't let me give you more rep until I "spread some around" (ewwww! ) Anyway, I would if I could!

Edited May 6, 2015 by LameLefty

I don't think the version file was updated, as the version checker keeps bitching about a new version.

That said, this plug is amazing and super helpful. RPM integration is really cool too, can't wait to check it out.

Thanks for your hard work, this plug basically taught me how to manually dock.

Glad everyone's able to use it again

@jungletek - I definitely updated the version file (you can check yourself, it reports version 6.2). Is anyone else getting that?
I hate to ask... but I noticed it works with RPM fine but is there a plan to integrate it so it works with the MFD addon to RPM?? I cannot find it in the menus anywhere
There are a number of custom RPM MFDs, and I do intend to write configuration files for them if no one else does. Hopefully sooner than later!
I dont normally use mods, but when I do, this is one of the mods that I use.

I dont normally use mods, but when I do, this is one of the mods that I use.

He is the most interesting kingtutn in the world.
Interesting - this mod is the only one I have that pops WS.Reputation.1 warning in Norton antivirus.
